body_html:
quote "googletest.gpu_device_name() returns /gpu:0 but self._StripGraph(gd) returns proto that contains /device:GPU:0"
what's the reason to faover "/device:GPU:0" over "/gpu:0"? It seems the "device:" is redundant and avoiding it allows to keep backward compatibility?

body:
quote "googletest.gpu_device_name() returns /gpu:0 but self._StripGraph(gd) returns proto that contains /device:GPU:0"
what's the reason to faover "/device:GPU:0" over "/gpu:0"? It seems the "device:" is redundant and avoiding it allows to keep backward compatibility?
